The data is fetched on the server, HTML is generated, and sent to your browser. Refresh this page multiple times and watch the timestamps change immediately!"]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 opacity-75","children":"Generated on server for this request"}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-500 to-pink-600 rounded-lg p-6 border-yellow-200 rounded-lg p-6 mb-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-lg font-bold text-yellow-800 mb-3","children":"üîç How to Verify SSR:"}],["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal list-inside space-y-2 text-gray-700","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Refresh Test:"}]," Press Cmd+R (Mac) or Ctrl+R (Windows) multiple times. Notice the timestamp changes ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"immediately"}]," on every refresh."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"View Page Source:"}]," Right-click ‚Üí \"View Page Source\". You'll see the data is already in the HTML (not loaded via JavaScript)."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Network Tab:"}]," Open DevTools ‚Üí Network tab. You won't see XHR/Fetch requests for this data because it's server-rendered."]}],["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Server Logs:"}]," Check your terminal running ",["$","code",null,{"children":"npm run dev"}],". You'll see logs for every page request."]}]]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-6 mb-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-lg font-bold text-gray-800 mb-3","children":"üìù Code Implementation:"}],["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-900 text-green-400 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto text-sm","children":"// app/demo/ssr/page.tsx\n\nasync function getServerData() {\n  // This runs on the server for EVERY request\n  const data = await fetch('https://api.example.com/data', {\n    cache: 'no-store' // üëà This makes it SSR\n  })\n  return data.json()\n}\n\nexport default async function SSRPage() {\n  const data = await getServerData()\n  return <div>{data}</div>\n}"}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3
